UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: In Vitro and In Vivo Anti- Candida Activity and Structural Analysis of Killer Peptide (KP)-Derivatives.
Literature.Author: Ciociola T, Pertinhez TA, De Simone T, Magliani W, Ferrari E, Belletti S, D'Adda T, Conti S, Giovati L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<2% Hemolysis=50 µM,Monkey kidney epithelial cells LLC-MK2:<1% Killing=10-25 µM,Monkey kidney epithelial cells LLC-MK2:8.91% Killing=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(EC50=0.761µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MFC=5µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(90-100% Inhibition=5µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(60-70% Inhibition=5µg/ml)
